Document.p: Blacksmiths turn steel and coal into goods. You will use them mostly early on in the game. They also use labor, of course.
Before you have steel works, you must rely on the steel produced by communes. 5 or 6 communes per blacksmith is recommended.
You can see when a blacksmith is working in the usual way, by clicking on it, and every so often the animation will come to life.
Per 100 days of working, 1 pollution is produced.
